msbt.message: Hey, ! Blow the candles out with !Everyone is waiting for you! Show 'em how it's done, .
Listen up! Go stand in front of the cake Focus your mind.Concentrate. See victory in your mind. Then press And that's how you can blow all the candles out at once, !
C'mon! Hit  to suplex those candles with your lungs! The cake will start melting if you don't, !
Check you out! Your muscles have a real nice glow today.Whoa! Are you STRONGER because it's your birthday?Barbells! I wish MY birthday would do that to me, .
Happy birthday, !Celebrating a birthday is like scoring another point in the game of life. Congrats, .
You're the star player today! Feel free to stand out a little more!'Cause I always make sure to stand out A LOT on my birthday!
Having fun, ?We put up a bunch of decorations just for you! Of course, I did all the heavy lifting, !
We all picked out a present for you!I was saying you needed weights. And maybe more weights. But everyone overruled me
You and I have the same birthday!I've always not-so-secretly thought of you as my rival! But maybe you're actuallymy twin, !
You know, you and I actually have the same birthday!Maybe we oughta be a pro wrestling tag-team duo! The Birthday Barbells! How's that sound, ?
Having a birthday on New Year's Day means you can celebrate twice as much, !But does that mean that everybody else is too tired from the night before to celebrate with you?

A February 29th birthday is the coolest thing!Your birthday only comes along every four years, just like the Sportigames!Wait. If you only have a birthday every four years, how old does that make you now, ?
It's February 29th today AND it's your birthday! That's cause for a double celebration!It's a lucky day that only happens once every four years!
With a birthday on , you have an easy birthday to remember!It was my jersey number at camp!Then again, I can never remember what the date is But I'll always remember my jersey number!
Did you know if you work out on your birthday, you get quintuple the gains? It's true, !
Your arms are magnificent, but I still don't know how you're gonna lift all your presents, .Birthday problems are the best problems, aren't they?
Come on! Hurry up and smash the piñata! I can't wait to see what's in there, !
Alright! Hit this piñata! Then hit it again and again and again! Swing for the fences, !
Time to show off all that strength training, ! DESTROY that piñata!
